languages.text: Население Даргонуса растет, старые порядки пора реформировать. Даровав ремесленникам право объединяться в гильдии, защищающие свои права и контролирующие сегменты ульев, Вольный Торговец вызовет промышленный бум. Поверхность планеты истерзают бури и кислотные дожди из отравленных облаков.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.
languages.original_text: Население Даргонуса растет, старые порядки пора реформировать. Даровав ремесленникам право объединяться в гильдии, защищающие свои права и контролирующие сегменты ульев, Вольный Торговец вызовет промышленный бум. Поверхность планеты истерзают бури и кислотные дожди из отравленных облаков.

traits.locale_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite into guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.
Granting the right to unite into guilds will cause an explosive growth of industry which will in turn lead to dehydration of the planet's surface.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.
Granting the right to unite into guilds will cause an explosive growth of industry which will in turn lead to the dehydration of the planet's surface.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite into guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

languages.text: À mesure que la population de Dargonus croît, les anciennes traditions doivent être remises au goût du jour. Permettre aux artisans de former des guildes afin de protéger leurs droits et contrôler des sections entières de la ruche entraînera une forte croissance de l'industrie. Cela engendrera néanmoins des tempêtes dévastatrices, et l'empoisonnement de l'atmosphère rendra la pluie extrêmement acide.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

traits.locale_text: À mesure que la population de Dargonus croît, les anciennes traditions doivent être remises au goût du jour. Permettre aux artisans de former des guildes afin de protéger leurs droits et contrôler des sections entières de la ruche entraînera une forte croissance de l'industrie. Cela engendrera néanmoins des tempêtes dévastatrices, et l'empoisonnement de l'atmosphère rendra la pluie extrêmement acide.

languages.text: ダルゴナスの人口が増加するにつれ、古い習慣は改善しなければならない。職人たちがギルドで団結し、自分たちの権利を守り、巣全体を支配できるようにすれば、産業は爆発的に成長する。その結果、破壊的な暴風雨が吹き荒れ、汚染された大気から酸性雨が降り注ぐことになるだろう。
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスの人口が増加するにつれ、古い習慣は改善しなければならない。職人たちがギルドで団結し、自分たちの権利を守り、巣全体を支配できるようにすれば、産業は爆発的に成長する。その結果、破壊的な暴風雨が吹き荒れ、汚染された大気から酸性雨が降り注ぐことになるだろう。

languages.text: 达戈努斯的人口越来越多，以往的律法也必须进行改革。这项法案通过之后，工匠师将会联合起来，保障他们的权利，加强巢都工业区域的管控，从而使得巢都的工业水平产生爆炸性的增长。然而，这也同样会使得巢都气候急剧恶化，狂啸的风暴会不断来袭，致命的酸雨也会从有毒的大气中倾泻而下。
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯的人口越来越多，以往的律法也必须进行改革。这项法案通过之后，工匠师将会联合起来，保障他们的权利，加强巢都工业区域的管控，从而使得巢都的工业水平产生爆炸性的增长。然而，这也同样会使得巢都气候急剧恶化，狂啸的风暴会不断来袭，致命的酸雨也会从有毒的大气中倾泻而下。

languages.text: Conforme la población de Dargonus crece, es necesario mejorar las antiguas formas. Permitir que los artesanos formen gremios y se unan para proteger sus derechos y controlar secciones enteras de sus colmenas provocará un crecimiento explosivo de la industria, que a su vez desatará lluvias torrenciales y ácidas por la atmósfera contaminada.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

traits.locale_text: Conforme la población de Dargonus crece, es necesario mejorar las antiguas formas. Permitir que los artesanos formen gremios y se unan para proteger sus derechos y controlar secciones enteras de sus colmenas provocará un crecimiento explosivo de la industria, que a su vez desatará lluvias torrenciales y ácidas por la atmósfera contaminada.

languages.text: Die Bevölkerung von Dargonus wächst, die alten Prozesse müssen daher verbessert werden. Den Handwerkern zu gestatten, sich zu Gilden zusammenzuschließen, um ihre Rechte zu beschützen und ganze Segmente der Makropole zu kontrollieren, wird zu einem explosiven Wachstum der Industrie führen. Das wiederum wird verheerende Stürme auslösen und sauren Regen aus der vergifteten Atmosphäre hinabregnen lassen.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.

traits.locale_text: Die Bevölkerung von Dargonus wächst, die alten Prozesse müssen daher verbessert werden. Den Handwerkern zu gestatten, sich zu Gilden zusammenzuschließen, um ihre Rechte zu beschützen und ganze Segmente der Makropole zu kontrollieren, wird zu einem explosiven Wachstum der Industrie führen. Das wiederum wird verheerende Stürme auslösen und sauren Regen aus der vergifteten Atmosphäre hinabregnen lassen.

languages.text: Dargonus'un nüfusu arttıkça eski yöntemlerin de geliştirilmesi gerekiyor. Zanaatkârların lonca kurarak birlik olmasına müsaade etmek, haklarını koruyup kovan segmentlerini idare etmelerini sağlayacak ve endüstride ani bir büyüme yaşanacak. Bu nedenle zehirlenen atmosferden yıkıcı fırtınalar doğup asit yağmurları yağacak.
languages.original_text: As the population of Dargonus grows, the old ways must be improved upon. Allowing the artisans to unite in guilds in order to protect their rights and control entire hive segments will cause an explosive growth of industry. This, in turn, will bring about devastating storms and acid rains pouring down from the poisoned atmosphere.
